5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Mu’adh bin Jabal that the Prophet (ﷺ) combined the Zuhr and ‘Asr, and the Maghrib and ‘Isha’ when traveling during the campaign of Tabuk

chapter.ara-name: باب الْجَمْعِ بَيْنَ الصَّلاَتَيْنِ فِي السَّفَرِ
